prodDesc: Smooth vanilla ice cream with a slight buttery flavor, with pecans added.
Butterscotch is a sweet and crunchy frozen dessert made using praline. It has a nutty buttery flavor.
Chocolate ice cream tastes like deep rich coco powder
Chocolate Chip Ice cream is made with a creamy vanilla base and chocolate chunks.
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough is unbaked chunks of chocolate chip cookie dough which are embedded in vanilla flavored ice cream.
Cookies and Cream is a rich and creamy vanilla ice cream stuffed full of chunks of Oreo cookies.
Mint Chocolate Chip ice cream composed of mint ice cream with small chocolate chips.
Neapolitan is a type of ice cream composed of three separate flavors of vanilla, chocolate, and strawberry arranged side by side.
Made with fresh strawberries and is very creamy and smooth.
The classic ice cream made by blending vanilla essence giving that vanilla aroma.
